sentences.sContent: $20 an hour is the going rate (= the usual amount paid ) for private tuition.
sentences.sCn: 每小时20美元是私人授课的一般收费。

sentences.sContent: ...some indicator which would rate the wealth of nations in both economic and environmental terms and show a relationship between the two...
...There is an incompatibility in the rate at which these are advancing relative to the way we're digesting it...
...it's not just the masses who tend to rate what they see more often more highly...
...Inequality is not just about the top marginal tax rate but also about our children's access to food and the right to justice for all...
...The graduation rate of first-generation students at Nijay's university was incredibly low...
...with an unemployment rate two points below the national average and one of the lowest rates of housing repossession...
...Standard & Poor's and Moody's Investors Service rate the level of risk of many corporate and government bonds...
...Spending on such "durables" dropped at a 12% annual rate in 2008's third quarter...
...a 20% rate in the fourth...
...The official unemployment rate is the product of a telephone survey of about 60000 homes...
...The poverty rate among women in the US rose to 14...
...human use of fresh water has increased at more than double the rate of population growth...
...That's a fertility rate of...
...After the personal-savings rate dipped to zero in 2005...
...the traditional poverty rate was 13...
...the household-savings rate exceeds 20%...
...which is estimated to have risen four times the inflation rate in recent years...
...Since 1982 tuitions have been rising at roughly twice the rate of inflation...
...The United States once had the highest graduation rate of any nation...
...the graduation rate of its blacks and Latinos had dipped to 63% by 2007...
...Many respondents rate women with golden hair as less intelligent than other people and red hair as more temperamental...
...and their dropout rate is the highest for any ethnic group in the country...
...a lower death rate...
